title: Welcome to SpygateAI
description: Learn the basics of using SpygateAI to analyze your Madden NFL gameplay.

steps.title: Welcome!
steps.description: Welcome to SpygateAI! This tutorial will guide you through the basic features of the application. Click 'Next' to continue.

steps.title: Main Interface
steps.description: This is the main interface of SpygateAI. The toolbar at the top contains quick access to all major features. The main area will display your video clips and analysis results.

steps.title: Video Import
steps.description: Click the 'Import' button to add your first gameplay video. You can drag and drop files here or use the file picker.

steps.title: Timeline View
steps.description: The timeline shows your imported clips. You can scrub through videos, add markers, and see detected formations and plays.

steps.title: Analysis Panel
steps.description: The analysis panel shows detailed information about the current frame, including detected formations, plays, and player positions.

steps.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
steps.description:
SpygateAI supports keyboard shortcuts for quick access:
- Space: Play/Pause
- Left/Right: Seek 5 seconds
- Up/Down: Seek 30 seconds
- Ctrl+A: Add annotation
- Ctrl+[/]: Change speed

steps.title: Getting Help
steps.description: Click the '?' icon in the toolbar to access help at any time. You can also press F1 to open the help window.

steps.title: Ready to Start!
steps.description: You've completed the basic tutorial! Click 'Finish' to start using SpygateAI, or explore other tutorials in the Help menu.
